item.title: Sunday Blues
item.description: A blog about genetics, its technological applications and their impact on society. One post each Sunday.

item.title: I love R
item.description: A collection of the dataviz that I did partecipating to the TidyTuesday weekly social project

item.title: PTRAPR
item.description: An R package to analyze Rice panicle architecture.

item.title: Postcards
item.description: Some graph in R turned postcards. If you like them, feel free to print them and give them as a gift. :)

item.title: What does the plant do?
item.description: A booklet about photosynthesis and how we study it.
